metadata.title: CVE-2023-3907 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A privilege escalation vulnerability in GitLab EE affecting all versionsfrom 16.0 prior to 16.4.4, 16.5 prior to 16.5.4, and 16.6 prior to 16.6.2allows a project Maintainer to use a Project Access Token to escalate theirrole to Owner

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
